questions.question: Which statement is correct? 'A dog is bigger than a mouse but smaller than an elephant.'
options: A dog is smaller than a mouse.
An elephant is bigger than a dog.
questions.answer: An elephant is bigger than a dog.

questions.question: What verb form completes the sentence, 'We usually ______ dinner at 8:00 p.m.'?
Which verb form completes the sentence, 'Yesterday, we ______ a very interesting conference call about the new ERP project'?
Which verb completes the sentence, 'The plane ______ at New York's Kennedy Airport'?
Which phrase completes the sentence, 'Thomas White, who orchestrated ___________ rescue packages, will address the group'?
Identify the correct prepositions that complete the sentence, 'Where is the computer printer in relation to the table and the computer?'
Complete the sentence according to the context using the correct prepositions. 'She always gets up early ______ the morning, so she can make it to class ______ time.'
Based on the context of the sentence, choose the correct meaning of the word 'tome.' 'I took the tome off the shelf and opened it to page 94. Then I began to read.'
Most poetry published in the South:
options: Did not reflect one of the familiar moods of the romantics
Was written by Edgar Allan Poe

questions.question: Poe had a preference for poems that dealt with:
options: The death of a beautiful woman
questions.answer: The death of a beautiful woman

questions.question: The author implies that Southern belles:
options: May often have been delicately sad
May have lived very melancholy lives

questions.question: The Messenger published:
options: Only Southern poets who wrote melancholy poems

questions.question: The words 'reminiscent of' mean most nearly:
Choose the correct prepositions to complete the sentence. 'The professor said ________ the first day of the course that there would be a big final test _______ the end of the semester.'
Choose the correct meaning of the word 'abhorrent' based on the context of the sentence. 'The thought of eating a rat is abhorrent to most people.'
Which of the following sentences is grammatically correct?
Choose the correct verb form: 'By the time we arrived, the concert ______.'
Identify the correct comparative structure: 'This book is ______ than that one.'
What is the meaning of the word 'indispensable' in the context: 'A skilled mechanic is indispensable in a racing team'?
Choose the correct prepositions: 'The report focuses ______ environmental issues ______ the region.'
Select the correct phrasal verb: 'She finally ______ after arguing for hours.'
What is the meaning of 'tentative' in the context: 'The meeting was scheduled for a tentative date'?
Choose the correct form of the verb: 'If I ______ you, I would apologize.'
Identify the correct phrase: 'He was accused ______ theft.'
Which word correctly completes the sentence: 'The scientist's work was ______ by her peers as groundbreaking.'
